result.title: Announcement: CPG Selection Test 2017-18
result.content:
Hello, everyone!

CPG Selection Test 2017-18 will be held on September 6, 2017 at 21:30 hrs.

The contest is ICPC-style. Each problem has 1 point. The penalty for a problem equals time taken (in minutes) to solve the problem from the start of the contest + 20 ×  number of rejected solutions. Total penalty equals the sum of penalties of solved problems.

The contest has been prepared by me (praran26). You will have 4 hours to solve 7 problems.

The problems are sorted by difficulty according to me, but I'll advise you to read all problems.

Hope you'll find the problems interesting. Good luck!

Edit 1: Due to network issues, the contest has been postponed for 1 hour.

Edit 2: Due to network issues, the contest will be held on September 3rd, Sunday at 12:45 PM. Apologies for the inconvenience caused.

Edit 3: The contest has been further postponed to September 6th, Wednesday at 09:30 PM due to internet issues.

Edit 4: Congratulations to the winners:

  1. hitman623
  2. GT_18
  3. Rmatrix
  4. Enigma27
  5. dafaq
